tool_description: Validates subscription plan modifications including pricing structure, feature combinations, and business rule compliance before implementation.

plan_id.description: Unique identifier of the subscription plan to modify

new_price.description: New price for the plan (must be >= 0)

features.description: List of feature identifiers included in the plan

error_messages: Invalid plan_id: Plan identifier must be a non-empty string and exist in the system.
Invalid billing_cycle: Must be one of [monthly, quarterly, yearly].
Invalid price: Price must be a non-negative number.
Empty features array: Plan must include at least one feature.
Plan name conflict: A plan with this name already exists.
usage: Provide plan_id, plan_name, billing_cycle, and features array. Optionally include new_price if modifying pricing. The tool validates all inputs against business rules and returns validation results.

is_valid.description: Whether the plan configuration is valid

validation_errors.description: List of validation error messages if any

warnings.description: List of warning messages for potential issues
